content: supplies & materials 200 yards knitpick/we crochet heatherly sport weight h/5 00mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle measuring tape gauge & sizes gauge 14 sts x 9 row size 8 5 tall x 10 wide notes written in us crochet terms a stitch count is provided at the end of each row worked in the round a stitch definition is provided chain 2 does not count as a stitch stitches & abbreviations chain chain ehdc extended half_double_crochet mc magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es yo yarn over i d love to hear from you don t hesitate to contact me let me know what you re working on or designs you d like to see in the future use the links above or email me at crochetsbytrista@gmail com if you ve purchased my designs in the past leave a review i want to know what you think you may sell finished items made with my pattern i just ask that you credit the design to crochets by trista i can not offer any refunds on patterns due to it being a pdf download
